version_description:
- Integrated chess engine Stockfish for analysis into the app
- Performance fixes for iOS 6

Native iPad Pro Support!
New look and Feel in the Store
- Added a what's new section to highlight the latest releases.
- Added publisher logos to enable you to quickly identify your favorite publishers
Added ChessPublishing.com Magazine Subscriptions
Added 3D Touch home screen menu
Added 3D Touch to 'My Books' and 'Store'
Have ideas for other uses of 3D Touch in the app? Let us know!
Bug fixes
- Fixed: Castling not allowed when it should be
- Fixed: En Passant crash
- Fixed: Board coordinates wrong when board is flipped

Resizable chess board
- Using the board settings popover you can now choose between S,M,L board sizes

Analysis Enhancements
- The analysis strings are now formatted to highlight the most important information quickly.
- Pause the analysis anytime by tapping anywhere in the analysis area. Tap again and the analysis will begin analyzing again.
- Optional Auto-Pause Analysis
- Long pressing the Analysis button will open a settings popover where you can set a limit for how long the analysis engine will be allowed to analyze.
- Ultimately this increases your battery life
- While analysis is running the analysis button will have an indicator that it is running.

Newsletter Signup Added
- Want to stay up to date with our latest news? Signup to our newsletter from within the app!

Sharing
- You can now tell all of your friends about the new chess book you just purchased or perhaps finished.

Bug Fixes:
- Missing book titles when reading on iPhone devices.
- Crash when promoting a pawn.
- Misc crashes when deleting and downloading books.

Fixes for iOS 10 Resizing text issue.

Please leave us a review if you find the app useful. It really helps!
Thanks!

You can now organize your books in your library using our new folder feature.
Finding books in the store is now easier than ever with our new search feature. You can now search for books by title or author.
We continually strive to make the app better by fixing various bugs reported by you. As a result, this update includes several bug fixes.

Please leave us a positive review in the App Store if you are enjoying the app.

- Bug Fixes
- Compatibility with iOS 13
- Compatibility with Dark Mode

Added books from two new publishers:
- Everyman Chess
- Elk and Ruby
More about publishers on www.everymanchess.com and www.elkandruby.com

- Bug fixes.
- iPhoneX compatibility.
- New tab - Reading Now.
- Better cloud functionality
Read books bought on other platforms.

iPhoneX and iOS 11 compatibility.
Bug fixes.

- Bug fixes.
- iPhoneX compatibility.
- New tab - Reading Now.
- Better cloud functionality
Read books bought on other platforms.

Added books from two new publishers:
- Everyman Chess
- Elk and Ruby
More about publishers on www.everymanchess.com and www.elkandruby.com
Compatibility with iOS 1.13, bug fixing.

- Bug Fixes
- Compatibility with iOS 13
- Compatibility with Dark Mode

- solved bugs with some books and chess positions
- improve chess engine
bug fixes (in some books there was a problem with some chess moves on chessboard).
bug fixes in chess engine
Bug fixes.

- Improvement for in app subscription
- Bug fixing, mainly in Dark mode

* Fixed iPhone issues caused by iOS 7
* Miscellaneous bug fixes

- ios 14
- improves chess engine

Updated chess engine to the latest release.
Fixed some Dark mode issues.
Changed some UX issues: rotate board, while in analysis mode, is now available right away.
